The main form CLA , cis-9 , trans-11-18:2 , produce directly bacterial hydrogenation rumen delta-9 desaturation co-product vaccenic acid ( trans-11-18:1 ) mammalian tissue include man . The second abundant isomer CLA trans-10 , cis-12-18:2 form . Observations clearly emphasize difference exist mammalian specie response CLAs mouse sensitive . Recent study indicate effect observe animal also pertain human volunteer . Reports detrimental effect CLA intake appear largely mice due mainly trans-10 , cis-12 isomer . DOC.brief_title: Effect Conjugated Linoleic Acid Alone Conjunction With Vitamin E Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus > 5 year HbA1c ≤ 9 % Overweight obese ( BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 ≤ 30 kg/m2 ) Age ≥ 30 ≤ 70 year ( postmenopausal female ) Stable medical therapy past 3 month Stable serum glucose past 3 month ( 128180 mg/Dl ) Age 30 50 Use metformin TG < 240 mg/Dl No alcohol , insulin , smoke No pregnancy , menopause Personal history coronary heart disease Cerebrovascular disease vascular disease Renal hepatic disease Inflammatory diseases thyroid disease within last year Use drug know affect glycemic control , beta blocker , change daily activity profile , diet
